title: Reward?
body: So I logged into the game and it said that I have received a reward on the top right of my screen. I have no idea what the reward was and didn't see riot announce any rewards. Do i have to retrieve it some how because I do not see anything new in my loot or icon page. Sorry if I am just stupid.

replies.body: lol needs to up their UI

Per the current [support ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-), we enabled toasts on the updated client.  You're seeing really old backlogs of notifications for items you already received.  Sorry for the confusion!

If you have the new client, just go to your notifications. (the bell thing right next to your summoner name), click it and claim your reward. Once you do so, you'll see what it was. For me, it was 2 new summoner icons from LOTPK (Legend Of The Poro King).
had the same thing happen today, my only guess is that it was a hex tech chest. i had one today but i dont think it was there yesterday, not sure why we got them though
